issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1.Base UI  > Views >  scrollable View 
2.tap the right arrow a few times while watching the circular view indicator
3.tap on the left quickly as well while watching
4.swipe through views and do the same

results: when using the arrows ot nav there is  'stutter" as the indicator draws itself as active, then inactive and active again. Not seen when swiping. not seen on 1.6.2
fields.summary: scrollable view - using arrows for nav has unexpected redraw issues on scroll page indicators
fields.environment: ipad1, iphone4. [INFO] Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (05/12/11 14:06 e6afca8...)

comments.body: Closing ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported. There is now a new version of Kitchen Sink so if there are any problems, please file a new ticket.
